content.raw:
Just a quick note on things to plot for joints:

  - GetAngle
  - GetVelocity
  - [Get Joint Angular acceleration? We don't currently have an API for this call]
  - GetForceTorque (reactive forces at a joint)
  - GetForce (user applied forces)

Recommend adding for Links:

  - GetWorldForce, GetRelativeForce
  - GetWorldTorque, GetRelativeTorque
  - GetWorldAngularMomentum
  - GetWorldEnergyPotential
  - GetWorldEnergyKinetic
  - GetWorldEnergy

It would be great to plot  results of physics engine `GetParam` call, for example [`rms_error`, `constraint_residual`, or other custom variables for different physics engines](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/9569d26d280c2b01ff670497211fee28211b161e/gazebo/physics/ode/ODEPhysics.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#ODEPhysics.cc-1576)
content.html:
Just a quick note on things to plot for joints:

  • GetAngle
  • GetVelocity
  • [Get Joint Angular acceleration? We don't currently have an API for this call]
  • GetForceTorque (reactive forces at a joint)
  • GetForce (user applied forces)

Recommend adding for Links:

  • GetWorldForce, GetRelativeForce
  • GetWorldTorque, GetRelativeTorque
  • GetWorldAngularMomentum
  • GetWorldEnergyPotential
  • GetWorldEnergyKinetic
  • GetWorldEnergy

It would be great to plot results of physics engine GetParam call, for example rms_error, constraint_residual, or other custom variables for different physics engines
